name: Katie Burke
coverLetter: I have three years of experience trimming as well as with other responsibilities required during the harvest season (harvesting, wet leafing by hand and machine, hanging to dry, bucking down, hand trimming, weighing and labeling). I passed the OLCC test for marijuana handlers and can provide my email confirmation for permit application upon request. I am extremely hard working and reliable and will work as many hours as needed for the season. I have experience working in the field on cold wet days, standing for long hours over a trim pro and sitting for days on end trimming by hand. These tasks never bother me, I never complain and I work well with others. I can't wait to get started with a new team this year!
